proj1

Class CashRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • proj1.CashRegister

  • public class CashRegister
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulates a cash register that is able to remove, return, and add items to a purchase using the Item class

    Since:
    - 9/23/16
    Version:
    - 1.0
    Author:
    Kian

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CashRegister()
      constructs a CashRegister with a total of 0$ and an empty purchase
      CashRegister(proj1.Item returnedItem)
      constructs a CashRegister with a returned item and credit equal to its price added to the purchase

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItem(proj1.Item itemPurchased)
      adds an item to the purchase and accounts for repeats of Items with the same name and size.
      void clear()
      removes all items from the purchase and sets the total to 0.
      proj1.Receipt getReceipt()
      Returns a receipt object carrying all the items in the purchase.
      double getTotal()
      returns the total of the purchase.
      void returnItem(proj1.Item unwantedItem)
      returns an item not previously added to the purchase and updates the total.
      void voidItem(proj1.Item unwantedItem)
      removes a previously item added to the purchase and removes its price from the total.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • CashRegister

        public CashRegister()
        constructs a CashRegister with a total of 0$ and an empty purchase

      • CashRegister

        public CashRegister(proj1.Item returnedItem)
        constructs a CashRegister with a returned item and credit equal to its price added to the purchase
        Parameters:
        returnedItem - - the item that is being added to the purchase as credit

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public void addItem(proj1.Item itemPurchased)
             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        adds an item to the purchase and accounts for repeats of Items with the same name and size. Also adds the items price to the total
        Parameters:
        itemPurchased - - the Item being added to the purchase
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • voidItem

        public void voidItem(proj1.Item unwantedItem)
        removes a previously item added to the purchase and removes its price from the total.
        Parameters:
        unwantedItem - - the Item that is being removed from the purchase.

      • returnItem

        public void returnItem(proj1.Item unwantedItem)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        returns an item not previously added to the purchase and updates the total.
        Parameters:
        unwantedItem - - the item being returned.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • clear

        public void clear()
        removes all items from the purchase and sets the total to 0.

      • getTotal

        public double getTotal()
        returns the total of the purchase.
        Returns:

        Throws:
